title: Bars with Yummi Nuts with Salt
ingredients: 2 cups of Yummi Nuts with Salt
instructions: Step 1: Place the peanuts in a food processor and process until they reach a liquid/creamy consistency. Add the honey and salt if you like. Process and place in a container.
Step 1: Place parchment paper on a baking sheet.
Step 2: In a bowl, mix the peanut butter, honey, and vanilla until smooth and mix well. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well.
Step 3: Place the mixture on the tray and press well. Refrigerate for an hour and then cut into strips or bars.
